## $try variable

Expects a body and error handler quotation on stack. Executes body within an implicit `try .. catch` and if an error was thrown pushes it on stack and executes error quotation.

( body catch -- ? )

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
$try: (ctx: StackContext) => StackContext
```
